description: This notification is generated when a user logs in.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cLogIn H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalSource s EXAMPLE

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalSource

description: This notification is generated when a user logs out.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cLogOut H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalSource s EXAMPLE

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalSource

description: This notification is generated when a user fails to log in

event.Summary: User $v1 login authentication failed due to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cLogInAuthenFailure H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalSource s EXAMPLE H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserAuthFailureReason i 1

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalSource

description: The reason why a user failed to log in.
variables.name: H3C-UI-MAN-MIB::h3cTerminalUserAuthFailureReason
